solution_line_template: First find the number of sage leaves Sabrina needs: {basil_leaves} basil / {basil_to_sage_ratio} basil/sage = <<{basil_leaves}/{basil_to_sage_ratio}={sage_leaves}>>{sage_leaves} sage

Then add {fewer_sage_than_verbena} to find the total number of verbena leaves she needs: {sage_leaves} sage + {fewer_sage_than_verbena} = <<{sage_leaves}+{fewer_sage_than_verbena}={verbena_leaves}>>{verbena_leaves} verbena

Finally, add up all the different leaves to find the total number: {sage_leaves} sage + {verbena_leaves} verbena + {basil_leaves} basil = <<{sage_leaves}+{verbena_leaves}+{basil_leaves}={total_leaves}>>{total_leaves} leaves
